Title: Dune: Part Two
Description: The continuation of the saga of Paul Atreides as he leads a rebellion to control the planet of Arrakis​.

Title: The Promised Land
Description: Mads Mikkelsen teams up again with director Nikolaj Arcel in this historical drama set in 18th century Denmark.

Title: Night of the Harvest
Description: A horror film from Gravitas Ventures, known for its atmospheric tension and chilling storyline.

Title: Paradox Effect
Description: An action-packed movie that dives into thrilling sequences and high-stakes scenarios. It’s also available on VOD/Digital.

Title: Lift
Description: Follows a master thief and his Interpol Agent ex-girlfriend who team up to steal $500 million in gold bullion being transported on an A380 passenger flight.

Title: Thanksgiving
Description: After a Black Friday riot ends in tragedy, a mysterious Thanksgiving-inspired killer terrorizes Plymouth, Massachusetts.

Title: Atlas
Description: In a bleak-sounding future, an A.I. soldier has determined that the only way to end war is to end humanity.

Title: Damsel
Description: A dutiful damsel agrees to marry a handsome prince, only to find the royal family has recruited her as a sacrifice to repay an ancient debt.

Title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
Description: Two ancient titans, Godzilla and Kong, clash in an epic battle as humans unravel their intertwined origins.

Title: Deadpool and Wolverine
Description: Deadpool is offered a place in the Marvel Universe by the Time Variance Authority, but instead recruits a variant of Wolverine to save his universe.

Title: Never Let Go
Description: A family that has been haunted by an evil spirit for years. Their safety come into question when one of the children questions if the evil is real.

Title: Venom: The Last Dance
Description: Eddie and Venom are on the run. Hunted by both of their worlds and with the net closing in, the duo are forced into a devastating decision.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Description: Crime epic, focusing on the murders of Osage members after oil was discovered on their land.

Title: Napoleon
Description: This film chronicles the rise and fall of French Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte and his empire.

Title: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One
Description: The latest in the "Mission: Impossible" series.

Title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
Description: A fun fantasy adventure featuring a group of unlikely heroes.

Title: Spaceman
Description: Half a year into his solo mission on the edge of the solar system, an astronaut concerned with the state of his life back on Earth.

Title: Nowhere
Description: A young pregnant woman named Mia escapes from a country at war by hiding in a maritime container aboard a cargo ship.

Title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
Description: Unleashed evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must join forces to protect their home.

Title: Road House
Description: Ex-UFC fighter Dalton takes a job as a bouncer at a Florida Keys roadhouse, only to discover that this paradise is not all it seems.

Title: The Watchers
Description: A young artist gets stranded in an extensive, immaculate forest in western Ireland, where, after finding shelter.

Title: The Fall Guy
Description: A stuntman has to track down a missing movie star, solve a conspiracy, and try to win back the love of his life.

Title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
Description: A young ape goes on a journey that will lead him to question everything.

Title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
Description: To defend Atlantis, Aquaman forges an alliance with his imprisoned brother.

Title: A Quiet Place: Day One
Description: As New York City is invaded by aliens, a woman named Sammy fights to survive.

Title: Slingshot
Description: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality aboard a possibly fatally compromised spacecraft.

Title: BlackBerry
Description: This film tells the story of the rise and fall of the BlackBerry smartphone, blending sharp humor with a smart narrative.

Title: Hit Man
Description: This film is based on the true story of a college professor who works as a fake assassin for sting operations.

Title: Smile 2
Description: About to embark on a world tour, global pop sensation Skye Riley begins experiencing increasingly terrifying and inexplicable events.

Title: The Ballad of Songbirds & Snakes
Description: Coriolanus Snow mentors and develops feelings for the female District 12 tribute during the 10th Hunger Games.

Title: Alien: Romulus
Description: While scavenging the deep ends of a derelict space station, a group of young space colonists come face to face with the most terrifying life form.

Title: Uglies
Description: In a dystopian world, a compulsory operation wipes out physical differences and makes everyone 'pretty'.

Title: Beetlejuice
Description: After a family tragedy, three generations of the Deetz family return home to Winter River. Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydia's life is turned upside down.

Title: Megalopolis
Description: The city of New Rome is the center of conflict between Cesar Catilina, a brilliant artist in favor of a utopian future, and the greedy mayor Franklyn Cicero.

Title: Twisters
Description: Kate Carter, a retired tornado-chaser and meteorologist, is persuaded to return to Oklahoma to work with a new team and new technologies.

Title: Sector 36
Description: A determined police officer must face off with a cunning serial killer as a chilling investigation unfolds, revealing dark secrets.

Title: Oppenheimer
Description: A biographical drama about J. Robert Oppenheimer, the theoretical physicist known as the 'father of the atomic bomb' for his role in the Manhattan Project during World War II.

Title: Barbie
Description: A live-action film based on the popular Barbie toy line, exploring themes of identity and self-discovery as Barbie navigates the real world.

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Description: Miles Morales returns for the next chapter of the Spider-Verse saga, an animated adventure that explores multiple dimensions and introduces new Spider-heroes.

Title: Tenet
Description: A sci-fi action thriller where a secret agent embarks on a dangerous, time-bending mission to prevent the start of World War III.

Title: Joker
Description: A gritty character study of Arthur Fleck, a man disregarded by society who transforms into the infamous Joker.

Title: Dune
Description: A young nobleman named Paul Atreides embarks on a journey to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and people.

Title: Black Widow
Description: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

Title: No Time to Die
Description: James Bond has left active service, but his peace is short-lived when an old friend from the CIA turns up asking for help.

Title: The Batman
Description: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.

Title: Top Gun: Maverick
Description: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell is back to confront the ghosts of his past.

Title: Avatar: The Way of Water
Description: Jake Sully and Neytiri have formed a family and are doing everything to stay together, but they must leave their home and explore the regions of Pandora.

Title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
Description: Dr. Stephen Strange casts a forbidden spell that opens the doorway to the multiverse, including alternate versions of himself.

Title: The Suicide Squad
Description: A group of cons are sent on a dangerous mission to destroy a Nazi-era prison and laboratory.

Title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
Description: Shang-Chi confronts the past he thought he left behind when he's drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

Title: Jungle Cruise
Description: Based on Disneyland's theme park ride, a small riverboat takes a group of travelers through a jungle filled with dangerous animals and reptiles.

Title: The Matrix Resurrections
Description: Return to a world of two realities: one, everyday life; the other, what lies behind it.

Title: Nope
Description: Residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

Title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
Description: The leaders of Wakanda fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers in the wake of King T'Challa's death.

Title: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery
Description: Detective Benoit Blanc travels to Greece to peel back the layers of a mystery involving a new cast of suspects.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 4
Description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating the High Table, but before he can earn his freedom, a new enemy arises.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Description: The Guardians embark on a mission to protect one of their own that could lead to the end of the team.

Title: The Super Mario Bros. Movie
Description: A plumber named Mario travels through an underground labyrinth with his brother, Luigi, trying to save a captured princess.

Title: Fast X
Description: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes.

Title: Thor: Love and Thunder
Description: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg, and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher.

Title: Minari
Description: A Korean-American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of their own American Dream.

Title: Nomadland
Description: Following the economic collapse of a town in rural Nevada, a woman embarks on a journey through the American West, living as a van-dwelling modern-day nomad.

Title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help, leading to a spell that goes terribly wrong.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Description: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an adventure where she alone can save the world by connecting with parallel universe versions of herself.

Title: Elvis
Description: A biographical musical drama that explores the life and music of Elvis Presley, seen through the lens of his complicated relationship with his manager, Colonel Tom Parker.

Title: Promising Young Woman
Description: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who cross her path.

Title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
Description: Based on the infamous 1969 trial of seven defendants charged by the federal government with conspiracy and more.

Title: The French Dispatch
Description: A love letter to journalists set in an outpost of an American newspaper in a fictional 20th-century French city.

Title: The King's Man
Description: In the early years of the 20th century, the Kingsman agency is formed to stand against a cabal plotting a war.

Title: Eternals
Description: A race of immortal beings with superhuman powers who have secretly lived on Earth for thousands of years reunite to battle the Deviants.

Title: The Father
Description: An aging man struggles with memory loss and begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind, and even reality itself.

Title: Don't Look Up
Description: Two astronomers go on a media tour to warn mankind of a planet-killing comet hurtling toward Earth.

Title: The Abyss of Time
Description: A group of explorers venture into an ancient, submerged city and uncover secrets that bend their understanding of time and reality.

Title: The Marvels
Description: Carol Danvers teams up with Monica Rambeau and Kamala Khan to protect the universe from a new cosmic threat.

Title: The Creator
Description: In a future war between humans and AI, a hardened ex-soldier is tasked with a mission to destroy an advanced AI that could end humanity.

Title: The Flash
Description: Barry Allen uses his super speed to travel back in time to change the past, but his actions lead to unintended consequences.

Title: Blue Beetle
Description: A young man becomes the superhero Blue Beetle after a mysterious scarab binds to him and grants him powers.

Title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
Description: The Autobots team up with a new faction of Transformers known as the Maximals to battle a common enemy.

Title: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny
Description: Indiana Jones is back on a new adventure, this time searching for a mythical dial that can control time.

Title: The Equalizer 3
Description: Robert McCall finds himself in Southern Italy, protecting a local community from violent crime syndicates.

Title: A Haunting in Venice
Description: Detective Hercule Poirot investigates a supernatural murder mystery in post-war Venice.

Title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
Description: A family discovers their connection to the original Ghostbusters and must stop a new ghostly threat from taking over the town.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Description: Teenager Billy Batson transforms into the adult superhero Shazam and faces off against the powerful daughters of Atlas.

Title: The Nun II
Description: Sister Irene once again comes face to face with the demon nun Valak in a terrifying new chapter.

Title: The Killer
Description: A solitary assassin meticulously plans his next mission while grappling with his own emotional turmoil.

Title: Gone with the Wind
Description: A Southern belle's life during and after the American Civil War is chronicled in this epic drama.

Title: The Wizard of Oz
Description: A young girl from Kansas is swept away to a magical land where she must find her way back home.

Title: The Sound of Music
Description: A young governess brings joy and music into the lives of an Austrian family during World War II.

Title: In Time
Description: In a future where time is literally money, a man fights to survive and change the system.

Title: Shutter Island
Description: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a patient from a hospital for the criminally insane.

Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
Description: The story of a stockbroker who rises to wealth through corruption and fraud, living a life of excess.

Title: Seven
Description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

Title: Prisoners
Description: A desperate father takes matters into his own hands when his daughter and her friend go missing.

Title: Gladiator
Description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

Title: Armageddon
Description: A team of deep-core drillers is sent by NASA to stop a massive asteroid on a collision course with Earth.

Title: Identity
Description: Strangers stranded at a desolate Nevada motel realize they are being targeted by a killer.

Title: Enemy at the Gates
Description: Two snipers engage in a deadly game of cat and mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

Title: Zodiac
Description: A San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac killer.

Title: The Last Castle
Description: A former general imprisoned for disobeying orders leads a revolt within a maximum-security military prison.

Title: Inception
Description: A thief who enters the dreams of others must pull off the ultimate heist by planting an idea in a target's mind.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Title: The Godfather
Description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham, but he soon finds himself prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

Title: The Godfather: Part II
Description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Title: 12 Angry Men
Description: A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as clear-cut as it seemed in court.

Title: Schindler's List
Description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with a low IQ.

Title: Fight Club
Description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

Title: Inception
Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into a CEO's mind.

Title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
Description: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire on their new base, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman.

Title: The Matrix
Description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Title: Goodfellas
Description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife and his partners.

Title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
Description: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse.

Title: Seven Samurai
Description: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

Title: Se7en
Description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

Title: It's a Wonderful Life
Description: An angel is sent from Heaven to show a frustrated businessman what life would have been like if he never existed.

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI cadet seeks the help of an imprisoned and manipulative cannibal killer to catch another serial killer.

Title: City of God
Description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

Title: Saving Private Ryan
Description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper.

Title: Life Is Beautiful
Description: A Jewish man uses humor to shield his son from the horrors of a Nazi concentration camp.

Title: Interstellar
Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Title: The Green Mile
Description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

Title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
Description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.

Title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
Description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must protect her teenage son from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

Title: Back to the Future
Description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend.

Title: Spirited Away
Description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits.

Title: Psycho
Description: A secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under his mother's domination.

Title: The Pianist
Description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto during World War II.

Title: Parasite
Description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family by infiltrating their household and posing as unrelated, highly qualified individuals.

Title: Léon: The Professional
Description: A professional assassin reluctantly takes in a 12-year-old girl after her family is murdered.

Title: The Lion King
Description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

Title: Gladiator
Description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Title: American History X
Description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path.

Title: The Usual Suspects
Description: A sole survivor tells of the twists and turns leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

Title: The Departed
Description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Title: The Prestige
Description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

Title: Casablanca
Description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape French Morocco.

Title: Whiplash
Description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

Title: The Intouchables
Description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

Title: Modern Times
Description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

Title: Once Upon a Time in the West
Description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a widow from a ruthless assassin.

Title: Rear Window
Description: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

Title: Alien
Description: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form.

Title: City Lights
Description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a destitute man sets out to help a blind flower girl he has fallen in love with.

Title: Apocalypse Now
Description: A U.S. Army officer is sent on a mission to assassinate a renegade Special Forces colonel in Cambodia during the Vietnam War.

Title: Memento
Description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

Title: Django Unchained
Description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

Title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
Description: In 1936, archaeologist Indiana Jones races against Nazis to find the Ark of the Covenant.

Title: WALL·E
Description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will decide the fate of mankind.

Title: The Shining
Description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

Title: The Lives of Others
Description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police becomes disillusioned with his job after monitoring a writer and his lover.

Title: Paths of Glory
Description: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

Title: Avengers: Infinity War
Description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos.

Title: Sunset Blvd.
Description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

Title: The Great Dictator
Description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution.

Title: Witness for the Prosecution
Description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

Title: Aliens
Description: Ellen Ripley is rescued decades after surviving an apocalyptic attack on her ship, and she must fight a terrifying alien species once more.

Title: American Beauty
Description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's friend.

Title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
Description: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

Title: The Dark Knight Rises
Description: Eight years after the Joker's reign, Batman encounters the mysterious Selina Kyle and the ruthless Bane.

Title: Oldboy
Description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

Title: Once Upon a Time in America
Description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan, where he once again must confront the ghosts of his old life.

Title: Das Boot
Description: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth, and sheer terror.

Title: Joker
Description: In Gotham City, a mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral of social revolution and bloody crime.

Title: Citizen Kane
Description: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance.

Title: Braveheart
Description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Title: Vertigo
Description: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

Title: North by Northwest
Description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by foreign spies.

Title: Reservoir Dogs
Description: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

Title: Requiem for a Dream
Description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

Title: Amélie
Description: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and discovers love along the way.

Title: M
Description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

Title: Taare Zameen Par
Description: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker until a new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

Title: A Clockwork Orange
Description: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

Title: Lawrence of Arabia
Description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led diverse Arab tribes during World War I.

Title: Double Indemnity
Description: An insurance representative lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses an insurance investigator's suspicions.

Title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
Description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

Title: Taxi Driver
Description: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

Title: Singin' in the Rain
Description: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

Title: Toy Story 3
Description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a daycare center instead of the attic before Andy leaves for college.

Title: Amadeus
Description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the composer who was envious of Mozart's talent.

Title: Inglourious Basterds
Description: In Nazi-occupied France, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans.

Title: 3 Idiots
Description: Two friends are searching for their long-lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them.

Title: Full Metal Jacket
Description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects of the Vietnam War on his fellow recruits from boot camp to the bloody street fighting.

Title: The Sting
Description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

Title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
Description: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins.

Title: Bicycle Thieves
Description: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen, endangering his job and family's survival.

Title: Toy Story
Description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

Title: The Kid
Description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put their relationship in jeopardy.

Title: Snatch
Description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, and amateur robbers converge around a priceless stolen diamond.

Title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
Description: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many silly obstacles.

Title: Good Will Hunting
Description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

Title: L.A. Confidential
Description: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

Title: Scarface
Description: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel while succumbing to greed.

Title: The Hunt
Description: A teacher's life is destroyed by a lie that spreads like wildfire in his small town.
